quest.name: Tonight We Dine in Shells
journal:
Zukin needs help putting together a feast.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Lure out voracious gasame with oyster meat at Hells' Lid and slay them for their red-hot carapaces.
Deliver the red-hot carapaces to Zukin.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: As you will doubtless appreciate, treasure hunting is hungry work. To help us keep up our strength, Kaioke will cook a hearty meal, and for this he requires several red-hot carapaces.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: If each one of us could procure but two, we will have enough in no time. Here, take this oyster meat. You can use it to lure out voracious gasame at Hells' Lid.

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Other gasame may well be drawn to the bait, but not all will yield the carapace we need. Take care, and good luck!

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Ah, you are returned. Have you obtained your share of carapaces?

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Oho, such big, fiery shells! This shall be a proper feast!

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: Turn these over and fill them with ingredients, and in no time we'll have a tasty and nourishing gasame stew! Ahhh, the mere thought of it makes my mouth flood...

dialogue.name: ZUKIN
dialogue.text: You will enjoy it, too, I do not doubt. But as popular as it is, you must forgive us should it run out before you get a taste!
